name: Dog Simulator 2k23
description:
Dog Simulator 2k23

Made for LIC Jam 2023.  A game inspired by watching my dog hype himself up into having crazy zoomies and knocking over half the shit in my apartment.

How to play

Charge up your zoomie energy, and use it to tear up as much of the apartment as you can in 30 seconds.

To charge your zoomie energy, run around the apartment while not hitting into anything. When your zoomie meter is full, press 'z' to zoom, and then smash into as much stuff as you can for points. Don't get stuck lol

Credits

3d house model by Synty.  Voxel dog by Voxelguy. Smoke by Maiami Studio. Audio by my mouth.

Special thanks to Andy and Tuppy.

Check out Andy's game, Devil Daddy Descent! It is very fun and is definitely more of a game than this!
